description:
With the help of Haku Gessho and Suusu, all of the Northern Mountain Emperor`s memories of the time he lived in the Goyou kingdom have been returned. Angered by this, Sashi tries to use the Nightmare Fox to bring the Northern Mountain Emperor back under his control, but is thwarted by the mysterious appearance of the Goyou kingdom`s princess from so long ago. Will the Northern Mountain Emperor be able to fulfill the reincarnation matchmaking vow he made as a young boy? Meanwhile, Yaya convinces Haku Gessho to marry Suusu by agreeing to his enormous debt, but Suusu is not thrilled by this turn of events. What does this mean for their future?
Source: crunchyroll
